defaultProblems.title: Philip
defaultProblems.description: I am a Professor of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii, Director of the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory, and the CEO of OpenPowerQuality.com.

defaultContacts.name: Big Panda
defaultContacts.bio: Hi, my name is Panda. I am a Panda officer at University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science, and I frequently work with Bamboo.
